instructions:
Cream butter and sugars. Add beaten eggs. Dissolve soda in hot water. Add sifted flour and salt
alternately with soda mixture. Mix in vanilla and add nuts and chocolate chips.
Drop by half teaspoonful onto greased cookie sheet. Bake in moderate oven at 375 F for 10 to 12 minutes.
Makes 100 cookies.
name: Origional Toll House Cookies
